medical_history.chief_complaint: Sharp right lower quadrant pain developed after resolving diffuse abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced an episode of diffuse abdominal pain last night that resolved by the morning. At noon following lunch, a sharp right lower quadrant pain developed, which has been constant. The patient has not had emesis, diarrhea, fevers, or chills.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Status post lumpectomy in bilateral breasts which were benign, gastritis, s/p hysterectomy.
medical_history.family_history: Mother died of breast cancer. Father passed away from an etiology that was unknown.
